name: E-Elementals
description:
E-Elementals is a story-focused linear 2D puzzle platformer where you play as E-Elemental 1k7. E-Elementals are advanced bots born in a lab that are tasked with doing a variety of tests. As E-Elemental 1k7, you will go on a journey through the lab. You will solve puzzles, fight tough bosses, and learn the history of the lab through various characters that you will speak with...

Key features:
  • Use the powerful absorption abilities of E-Elementals to overcome many trials!
  • Journey through a dangerous laboratory with various different zones!
  • Learn the truth about E-Elementals and the laboratory from dialogue with a multitude of interesting characters!
